item.description: Image: Square Enix via Polygon Time is finite, and yet I jump between two seemingly endless games Final Fantasy 14 and Genshin Impact are both behemoths. Although developer Hoyoverse released Genshi...
item.content:encoded: Image: Square Enix via Polygon Time is finite, and yet I jump between two seemingly endless games Final Fantasy 14 and Genshin Impact are both behemoths. Although developer Hoyoverse released Genshin just two years ago, the game has grown to include several giant regions and features a regular cycle of new content and events every six weeks. Similarly, Square Enix released Final Fantasy 14 in 2010 (and then again in 2013) and it still gets regular updates; it has since grown to receive four ma...

item.description: Image: James Bareham/Polygon 43 games given out, but not much to analyze, really You may have noticed that Polygon didn‚Äôt do an analysis of what Xbox Live‚Äôs Games With Gold program offered in 2022, ...
item.content:encoded: Image: James Bareham/Polygon 43 games given out, but not much to analyze, really You may have noticed that Polygon didn‚Äôt do an analysis of what Xbox Live‚Äôs Games With Gold program offered in 2022, like it did for PlayStation Plus Essential. Honestly, it‚Äôs because expectations of that catalog are now so low ‚Äî and Microsoft doesn‚Äôt seem interested in beating them ‚Äî that it‚Äôs just not worthwhile. Bagging on these games, the majority of which were small-scale titles, largely anonymous when they l...

item.title: The new PS Plus still couldn‚Äôt compete with Xbox Game Pass in 2022 | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Sony Interactive Entertainment PS Plus Extra and Premium have a ways to go as subscribers stick with Essential PlayStation Plus Essential ‚Äî what everyone used to call good ol‚Äô PlayStation Plu...
item.content:encoded: Image: Sony Interactive Entertainment PS Plus Extra and Premium have a ways to go as subscribers stick with Essential PlayStation Plus Essential ‚Äî what everyone used to call good ol‚Äô PlayStation Plus ‚Äî once again turned in an outstanding roster of free games for players who subscribe, and of course, players have to subscribe if they want multiplayer access. But at the subscription‚Äôs new Extra and Premium tiers of service, which launched in June, it is, candidly, hard to see where the value is....

item.title: Xbox Games With Gold opens 2023 with two more from the bargain bin | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Photo: Microsoft Autonauts and Iris Fall start January with a meh If you were hoping Xbox Live Gold and Game Pass subscribers would start off 2023 by getting a couple of AAA games from Games With Go...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Microsoft Autonauts and Iris Fall start January with a meh If you were hoping Xbox Live Gold and Game Pass subscribers would start off 2023 by getting a couple of AAA games from Games With Gold, or maybe a well known indie, well ... you probably know where this is headed. The two titles Xbox Live Gold subscribers (it‚Äôs included with Game Pass Ultimate) get in January are Iris Fall and Autonauts. Autonauts launched this summer on all current consoles, but got its start on Windows PC back...

item.content:encoded: Image: Greg Rutkowski/Wizards of the Coast One D&D will launch with a new licensing agreement that will impact creators Wizards of the Coast will publish a new licensing agreement for the next iteration of Dungeons & Dragons, called One D&D, in early 2023. This new framework will only cover written materials, but its existence will impact creators of all stripes ‚Äî including but not limited to authors, independent publishers, video producers, and actual play troupes. The announcement, made in a...

item.description: Image: Sony Interactive Entertainment Plus Axiom Verge, all available Jan. 2 Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and Bethesda Softworks‚Äô Fallout 76 headline games PlayStation Plus Essential subscribers get...
item.content:encoded: Image: Sony Interactive Entertainment Plus Axiom Verge, all available Jan. 2 Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and Bethesda Softworks‚Äô Fallout 76 headline games PlayStation Plus Essential subscribers get access to beginning Jan. 2, Sony announced on Wednesday. They‚Äôre joined by Axiom Verge 2, the side-scrolling indie Metroidvania that launched in 2021. Fallen Order needs little introduction; it‚Äôs a Star Wars adventure set in the aftermath of the Empire‚Äôs hunt for, and elimination of, the Jedi Knigh...

item.title: Collecting rare Magic: The Gathering cards actually benefits artists | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Whitebacks are almost as old as the game itself At most Magic: The Gathering events, you will see guest artists with binders of cards ‚Äî the prices of which are very different than you‚Äôd expect. These...
item.content:encoded: Whitebacks are almost as old as the game itself At most Magic: The Gathering events, you will see guest artists with binders of cards ‚Äî the prices of which are very different than you‚Äôd expect. These are likely artist proofs, also known as ‚Äúwhitebacks,‚Äù or ‚ÄúAPs.‚Äù So, what are artist proofs and why should you care? To start with, you don‚Äôt have to care. Whitebacks are a totally optional thing in Magic, just like Secret Lair drops to an extent. But they represent a level of interest in the hobby ...

item.title: How NFT video games crashed and burned | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Nintendo The NFT gaming community only grew more niche and scam-filled in 2022 Less than 12 months ago, it felt as if 2022 would be the year NFTs took off in the video game world. Companies l...
item.content:encoded: Image: Nintendo The NFT gaming community only grew more niche and scam-filled in 2022 Less than 12 months ago, it felt as if 2022 would be the year NFTs took off in the video game world. Companies like EA, Ubisoft, Square Enix, Zynga, Niantic, and Take-Two Interactive all, at one point, said that they were brainstorming ways to add NFTs into their games. The idea being that non-fungible tokens would replace everything from loot boxes to character skins to even characters themselves. But none o...

item.title: EHR-Safe: Generating High-Fidelity and Privacy-Preserving Synthetic Electronic Health Records | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Jinsung Yoon and Sercan O. Arik, Research Scientists, Google Research, Cloud AI Team Analysis of Electronic Health Records (EHR) has a tremendous potential for enhancing patient care, quanti...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Jinsung Yoon and Sercan O. Arik, Research Scientists, Google Research, Cloud AI Team Analysis of Electronic Health Records (EHR) has a tremendous potential for enhancing patient care, quantitatively measuring performance of clinical practices, and facilitating clinical research. Statistical estimation and machine learning (ML) models trained on EHR data can be used to predict the probability of various diseases (such as diabetes), track patient wellness, and predict how patients respon...

item.description: Posted by Pritish Kamath and Pasin Manurangsi, Research Scientists, Google Research Differential privacy (DP) is an approach that enables data analytics and machine learning (ML) with a mathematical g...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Pritish Kamath and Pasin Manurangsi, Research Scientists, Google Research Differential privacy (DP) is an approach that enables data analytics and machine learning (ML) with a mathematical guarantee on the privacy of user data. DP quantifies the ‚Äúprivacy cost‚Äù of an algorithm, i.e., the level of guarantee that the algorithm‚Äôs output distribution for a given dataset will not change significantly if a single user‚Äôs data is added to or removed from it. The algorithm is characterized by tw...
